context: Zebra Technologies Corporation is a enterprise asset tracking company focused on barcode printers, RFID, mobile computers, and software. AI-powered analytics. Automation solutions.

competitors.name: Honeywell International
competitors.notes: Major competitor offering similar range of products and services; known for innovation in mobile computing, scanning, and printing

competitors.name: Datalogic
competitors.notes: Specializes in automatic data capture and industrial automation; strong market presence in Europe with innovative product lineup

competitors.name: Sato Holdings
competitors.notes: Renowned for printing solutions, particularly in barcode and RFID technology

competitors.name: Toshiba TEC
competitors.notes: Competitor in barcode printing and point-of-sale systems

competitors.name: Cognex Corporation
competitors.notes: Competitor in machine vision and industrial barcode reading

competitors.name: Alien Technology
competitors.notes: Competitor in RFID technology and solutions

competitors.name: Entrust
competitors.notes: Competitor in secure issuance and identification
